misc: Operates the Hector organization's digital media properties
Gotten increasingly close to winning the Hector Trophée but hasn't quite gotten it done yet
biography: Lasse, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is a golfer known for his dedication and his role behind the scenes. Representing Tapiola Golf, Lasse not only competes but also operates the Hector organization's digital media properties. His commitment to the sport extends beyond the course, making him a valuable asset to the tournament.

With eight past appearances, Lasse is set to make his ninth showing at the Hector Trophée 2025. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Lasse has gotten increasingly close to winning in recent years. His determination is evident in every swing, and spectators are eager to see if this will be the year he finally claims victory.
